deploy(uint32).details: Deploys all the tokens for the specified pools

harvestYield().details: Harvests token yield from the integration

params.amount: The amount of the token being deposited
params.token: The address of the deposited token

params.maxSellTokenA: max amount of tokenA to sell (to limit rebalancing)
params.maxSellTokenB: max amount of tokenB to sell (to limit rebalancing)
params.poolId: The ID of the pool to rebalance
params.ratioX1000: reserves ratio to control the price slippage

params.amount: The amount of token in the pool to withdraw

rebalancePool(uint32,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Rebalances by attempting to swap up to max to get into position ratio
